title: Nanoarchitectonics of 3D-networked bio-based binders for silicon anodes in lithium-ion batteries based on dynamic hydrogen bonding
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,843-851
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01323E, Paper
Liang Yu, Meng Chang, Miaolan Zhang, Yuting Yang, Ken Chen, Tao Jiang, Dean Shi, Qunchao Zhang, Jou You
A bio-based binder was developed to improve the electrochemical performance of silicon-anode lithium-ion batteries.
